redesignOfTheCompanysMainSite: Redesign of the company's main website
roadmapParagraph1: The year 2018 was a pivotal year for me, a year of questioning, particularly with regard to my main activity. In July 2018, I therefore chose to end my contract in order to integrate a two-year training course dedicated to learning the profession of computer scientist.
roadmapParagraph2: A few months after the start of my training (BTS SIO-SLAM), the choice of a profession imposed itself on me. Indeed, this training totaled a large number of areas related to computer science; in January 2019, I therefore decided to devote most of my learning time to website development.
roadmapParagraph3: In order to stand out, from 2020 I put my knowledge of web development into practice by carrying out a large number of professional and personal web projects. This is the year during which I made the most progress, especially with regard to responsive design and the JavaScript language.
roadmapParagraph4: I had the opportunity to carry out major professional projects, such as the development of a real-time cratography system as well as a business framework (JavaScript). At the same time, on my personal time, I continued my learning via many online tutorials.
roadmapParagraph5: Now that I've mastered the fundamentals of web development, it's time for me to find my place in the job market. I therefore devote my time to the realization of this portfolio by integrating a maximum of knowledge and hope to be able to integrate a company in the coming weeks.
roadmapParagraph6: I hope that one term this year I will have the opportunity to tackle more ambitious projects and that I will be able to participate actively in the development of more complex sites. Whatever happens, I will continue to nurture my interest in Web development by pursuing my personal projects.
welcomeText: Welcome to my portfolio ! It is representative of the different techniques and good methods that I have learned during my professional and personal career. Enjoy your visit
